refnamediv.refpurpose: Lists the BRL-CAD regions that are part of the indicated MUVES components.

refsection.para: Lists the BRL-CAD regions that are part of the indicated MUVES components. The internal list of MUVES components must have been created earlier by the read_muves command. The MUVES components listed on the command line must not use any wildcards (the expansion will result in BRL-CAD objects, not MUVES components).
The example shows the use of the l_muves command to list the BRL-CAD regions that make up specified MUVES components.

info.title: List the BRL-CAD regions that make up specified MUVES components.

listitem.para: Lists the BRL-CAD regions that make up the MUVES components named fuel and transmission."

refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
